titleStmt.title: Fearfull prodigies in Italy, seene neere the citie of Rome, in the aire, between the Castle Angelo and the Vatican as it was sent in a letter by a merchant of good credit living in Ligorne to Seignior Torriano, an Italian here resident in London, and by him faithfully translated into English.
titleStmt.author: Di Sofi, Antonio.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
